description: This file defines a theming class AppTheme for a Flutter application, centralizing the application's color scheme and theme data, including styles for app bar, floating action button, bottom navigation bar, cards, input decorations, and text themes.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class that provides a static getter for the application's light theme configuration.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: A static getter that constructs and returns a ThemeData object configured with a custom color scheme and styling for various UI components in Material 3 style.
